bibl.bibl: Marx, Karl. 1873. Das Kapital: Kritik der politischen Ökonomie. 2d edition. Hamburg: Otto Meissner.
bibl.idno: Subtitle and 2d ed. from WorldCat. Date and publisher from Marginalia. See also German Wikipedia ‘Das Kapital’. Only 1873 ed on WorldCat has different publisher. ELS Publisher from Marginalia: since that’s from an actual copy I take it it is possible (too). SE.
